categories.category_desc: Our Live Resin and other solvent extracts provide a pure, potent experience.

items.item_desc: True to its name, our creamy Electric Peanut Butter Live Resin badder features a nutty aroma complementary to its sweet flavor.
Our Thai Kush Live Resin Badder contains a funky flavor and aroma spiced with notes of citrus.

categories.category_desc: HASH's solventless extraction techniques ensure that our live rosin products provide a quality high.

items.item_desc: Cold cured Live Rosin made with fresh-frozen flower.
